name: omw
description:
~~~ Requires a Xbox 360 controller to work! ~~~

You live in a small town in a Nordic European country as a 14-year old. You’ve overstayed your curfew at a friend’s house and have to get home to avoid pissing off your sister.

Unfortunately, you’re not alone. Your usually uneventful town comes to life in one horror-filled night with shadowy figures, strange events, and someone following you. 

Walking through the quiet streets has never been more terrifying.

Can you make your way home in one piece?

A first-person horror game where you have to navigate and overcome obstacles while texting friends and someone else on the phone.
